se.sensiblethings.disseminationslayer.communication.security.messagehandler

Class MessageHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.sensiblethings.disseminationslayer.communication.security.messagehandler.MessageHandler

  • public class MessageHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    MessageHandler.java This class handles all communication messages in this protocol.

    Hao

      • securityRegister

        public void securityRegister(java.lang.String uci)
        Using the itself UCI, it first initialize the key store with generating its key pair and self signed certificate. Then it check whether it has the signed certificate, it will send the registration request to the bootstrap if not.
        Parameters:
        uci - Itself UCI

                      se.sensiblethings.interfacelayer.SensibleThingsNode toNode)
        Exchange Session Key

        (2.2) If (IDD, KS, Lifetime) temporary key store doesn't exist, or Lifetime is invalid C->D : E(PUD, KS) || E(PRC, H ([KS])) || E(KS, IDC || N1) || CertificateC
        Parameters:
        toUci - the UCI of the receiver
        toNode - the node of the receiver
